channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 据当地媒体财新网报道，中国将扩大一项计划，帮助更多地方政府降低债务风险
item.description:
China will expand a program to help more local governments reduce debt risks, local media Caixin reported https://t.co/FNUGyq5mIw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 9, 2024

item.title: 全球农民被迫毁掉他们的葡萄园，因为向非酒精饮料的转变和日益恶化的经济状况损害了葡萄酒的吸引力
item.description:
Farmers globally are being forced to destroy their vineyards as a shift to non-alcoholic drinks and worsening economic conditions hurt wine’s appeal https://t.co/x69zSTnoVf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 9, 2024

item.title: "意大利母亲必须全神贯注地照顾这些孩子--如果你在生孩子的问题上想得太多，你可能就会放弃"。
item.description:
“Italian mothers are required to give these children their absolute and total attention — if you think too hard about having kids you may simply give up” https://t.co/1t9OB1rWmw

item.title: 津巴布韦的道路坑坑洼洼，可以看出该国几十年来的衰落。首都哈拉雷终于有了维修计划
item.description:
Zimbabawe's decades of decline can be seen in its pothole-ridden roads. The capital of Harare finally has plans to make repairs https://t.co/qfWbmag0DY

item.title: 据 Jiji Press 报道，日本央行正在考虑取消收益率曲线控制计划，转而提前公布计划购买的政府债券数量。
item.description:
The Bank of Japan is considering scrapping its yield curve control program and instead indicating in advance the amount of government bonds it plans to purchase, Jiji Press says https://t.co/RqCD9kUfNM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 9, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 德克萨斯州 A&M 林业局的一份调查报告发现，Xcel 能源公司所有的一根木质电线杆在大风中倾倒，引发了德克萨斯州历史上最严重的野火。
item.description:
A wooden utility pole owned by Xcel Energy that toppled during high winds and sparked the worst wildfire in Texas history appeared to be decayed at its base where it broke and fell over, a Texas A&M Forest Service investigative report found https://t.co/uY954ZhhGP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 委内瑞拉副总统德尔西-罗德里格斯（Delcy Rodríguez）周五驳斥了一个由反对派领导的研究小组的调查结果，该小组的调查显示，2 月份消费者价格陷入通货紧缩。
item.description:
Venezuela’s Vice President Delcy Rodríguez on Friday rejected the findings of an opposition-led research group that showed consumer prices slipped into deflation in February https://t.co/0n67tIsmyM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国 2 月份失业率攀升至两年来的新高，尽管招聘情况依然健康，这表明劳动力市场趋冷但仍有韧性：晚间简报
item.description:
The US jobless rate climbed to a two-year high in February even as hiring remained healthy, pointing to a cooler yet resilient labor market: Here’s your Evening Briefing https://t.co/FRdsTNdGVz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国国会要求 TikTok 在美国出售产品或面临禁令的新努力得到了白宫的支持。以下是您需要了解的内容

item.title: 彭博贸易追踪报告显示，面对持续的供应链中断，强劲的需求使全球货运出现了不太可能出现的反弹。
item.description:
Resilient demand has allowed global shipments to pull off an unlikely rebound in the face of continuing supply chain disruptions, according to the Bloomberg Trade Tracker https://t.co/nNyGiw9r8J

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 惠誉上调了土耳其的信用评级，因为政府回归正统经济政策降低了金融稳定风险和国际收支压力
item.description:
Turkey’s credit rating was upgraded by Fitch, as the government’s return to orthodox economic policy reduces financial stability risks and balance-of-payments pressures https://t.co/LAUX2z0LKW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 随着波音公司最近在 737 Max 上的失误，空中客车公司有机会巩固其主导地位，并使这场竞争的天平更持久地向其倾斜。
item.description:
With Boeing on the ropes following its most recent mishap with the 737 Max, Airbus has an opportunity to cement its dominance and tilt the balance of this rivalry more permanently in its favor https://t.co/2JsVNIcriW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: S&P公司下调了乌克兰的信用评级，称乌克兰政府 "几乎肯定 "会将欧洲债券持有人纳入其债务减免努力中。

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 欧佩克及其盟国延长减产后，对冲基金将看跌美国原油的押注降至五个月来最低。
item.description:
Hedge funds slashed their bearish bets on US crude to the lowest in five months after OPEC and its allies extended production cuts. https://t.co/p3UbSLBB03

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 本周，任何人都在押注鹰派人物杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）会给华尔街带来恐惧，但结果却令人失望
item.description:
Anyone betting that a hawked-up Jerome Powell would strike fear on Wall Street this week was left disappointed https://t.co/kXOyE1l6xY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024
